flawed_nl_solution:
The bus started with 50 people - 15 who got off at the first stop = <<50-15=53>>53 people on the bus.
At the second stop, 53 people on the bus - 8 who got off = <<53-8=45>>45 people.
Then there were 45 people + 2 who got on = <<45+2=47>>47 people on the bus.
At the third stop, 47 people on the bus - 4 who got off = <<47-4=43>>43 people on the bus.
Then there were 43 people on the bus + 3 who got on = <<43+3=46>>46 people on the bus.
#### 46

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 35, not 53. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
